trans-unit.source: Provides 3-D to 2-D transformation support.
trans-unit.target: 提供 3D 到 2D 轉換的支援。

trans-unit.source: This class can transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Point> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Rect>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可以轉換<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>至<xref:System.Windows.Point>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>至<xref:System.Windows.Rect>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> 方法會傳回 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的物件。

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a clone (deep copy) of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用基底 (非動畫) 屬性值，將執行個體設為指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的複製品 (深層複製)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.CloneCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.CloneCore%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> to be cloned.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前的屬性值，讓執行個體成為指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的可修改複本 (深層複本)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 衍生類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.CreateInstanceCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.CreateInstanceCore%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The instance to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用基底 (非動畫) 屬性值，將執行個體設為所指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的凍結複製品。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.GetAsFrozenCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.GetAsFrozenCore%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> to copy and freeze.
trans-unit.target: 要複製和凍結的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
trans-unit.target: 將目前執行個體設為所指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的凍結複製品。

trans-unit.source: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件具有動畫相依性屬性，則會複製其目前的動畫值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The 3-D point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 3D 點。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified 3-D point and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定的 3D 點，並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming <paramref name="point" />.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 <paramref name="point" /> 的結果。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.Transform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.Transform%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The transform did not succeed.
trans-unit.target: 轉換失敗。

trans-unit.source: The 3-D bounding box to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 3D 週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned bounding box that contains all of the points in the original 3-D bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定的 3D 週框方塊，並傳回內含原始 3D 週框方塊中所有點的軸對齊週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: An axis-aligned bounding box that contains all of the points in the specified 3-D bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 軸對齊週框方塊，其中包含指定之 3D 週框方塊中的所有點。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.TransformBounds%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.TransformBounds%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The 3-D point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 3D 點。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming <c>inPoint</c>.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 <c>inPoint</c> 的結果。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified 3-D point and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定的 3D 點，並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="inPoint" /> was transformed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已轉換 <paramref name="inPoint" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.Transform%2A>方法，這個方法不會擲回例外狀況，如果轉換失敗。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.TryTransform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.TryTransform%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。
